mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_verification (email, verification_code, expires_at, is_verified, attempt_count) VALUES (#{email}, #{verificationCode}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE), FALSE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT verification_id as verificationId, email, verification_code as verificationCode, created_at as createdAt, expires_at as expiresAt, is_verified as isVerified, attempt_count as attemptCount FROM email_verification WHERE email = #{email} AND verification_code = #{code} AND expires_at > NOW() AND is_verified = FALSE ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE email_verification SET attempt_count = attempt_count + 1 WHERE email = #{email} AND is_verified = FALSE ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
